title: 2018 Kazakhstan Premier League
text:
The 2018 Kazakhstan Premier League was the 27th season of the <a href="Kazakhstan%20Premier%20League">Kazakhstan Premier League</a>, the highest <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league competition in <a href="Kazakhstan">Kazakhstan</a>. <a href="FC%20Astana">Astana</a> defended their championship, winning the Premier League for a fifth time.
Teams.
<a href="FC%20Okzhetpes">FC Okzhetpes</a> and <a href="FC%20Taraz">FC Taraz</a> were relegated at the end of the 2016 season, and were replaced by <a href="FC%20Zhetysu">FC Zhetysu</a> and <a href="FC%20Kyzylzhar">FC Kyzylzhar</a>.
Foreign players.
The number of foreign players is restricted to eight per KPL team. A team can use only five foreign players on the field in each game.
In bold: Players that have been capped for their national team.
Regular season.
